channel.title: Website on Portfolio Minimal Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Portfolio Minimal Demo

item.title: Portfolio Website - Personal Showcase
item.description:
A minimal, modern portfolio website built with Hugo and the Portfolio Minimal theme. Showcases projects, blog posts, and professional experience in a clean, accessible design.

Features

  • Clean Design: Minimal, distraction-free interface
  • Mobile Responsive: Works seamlessly across all devices
  • Dark Theme: Eye-friendly interface for extended reading
  • PDF Export: Export resume/CV directly from the website
  • Fast Loading: Optimized for performance and SEO

Technology Stack

Frontend

  • Hugo static site generator
  • Portfolio Minimal theme
  • CSS custom properties for theming
  • Responsive design with mobile-first approach

Hosting & Deployment
